title: Exodus Chapter 3 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Exodus chapter 3 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: Who said "I will now turn aside, and see this great sight, why the bush is not burnt" in Exodus 3:3?
questions.explanation: Exodus 3:3 states: "And Moses said, I will now turn aside, and see this great sight, why the bush is not burnt."
